text: The Bluefield Rams are the athletic teams for Bluefield College in Bluefield, Virginia. Bluefield College teams are nicknamed as the Rams. The university is a member of the National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics (NAIA), primarily competing in Appalachian Athletic Conference. In addition, the school is a member of the NCCAA and serves as host for the softball national championship. ==Achievements== In 2009, Bluefield won the NCCAA national baseball championship. Men's sports * Baseball * Basketball * Cross country * Football * Golf * Soccer * Tennis * Track and Field * Volleyball Women's sports * Basketball * Cheerleading * Cross country * Soccer * Softball * Tennis * Track and Field * Volleyball ==References== ==External links== *
title: Bluefield Rams
